alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 8:28PM CDT until May 07 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, extensive flooding of crop and pasturelands occur between Shady Point and Arkoma. Many roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday afternoon to a crest of 36.1 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
